Restricted quantifier version of ~ 19.21t ; closed form of ~ r19.21 . (Contributed by NM, 1-Mar-2008.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 2-Jan-2020.)

 Theorem 19.21 of [Margaris] p. 90 with restricted quantifiers (closed theorem version).  (Contributed by NM, 1-Mar-2008.)
statement: r19.21t $p |- ( F/ x ph -> ( A. x e. A ( ph -> ps ) <-> ( ph -> A. x e. A ps ) ) ) $.
